data.title: Jared Earle, Author at Nightfall Games
data.text:
The Terminator RPG is funded

The Terminator RPG by Nightfall Games is a table-top roleplaying game where you and your fellow players play characters trying to survive in a world where Skynet unleashes Terminators to fight humanity. Licensed by STUDIOCANAL, The Terminator RPG is based on the 1984...

SLA Industries 2nd Edition is at the printers

All four cover designs have been proofed, the inks reduced to 330% and the proofs approved. It’s happening. This means that we will be getting them back over the next four to six weeks, all going well, and then we will be shipping them out to you or your local...

SLA Industries 2nd Edition – Progress Report: Issue Two

After the success of Ex-Mass and Progress Report Issue One, we thought we’d like to give you something else before we send out the beta copies of the rules in a few months. And here it is, Progress Report Issue One To get this 36 page PDF, follow this link....

SLA Industries 2nd Edition Kickstarter

SLA Industries 2nd Edition had a very succesful Kickstarter and is now in production. If you missed the Kickstarter campaign but still wish to partake, late pledges are available on CrowdOx. The top-tier “Head Office” pledge is all gone, but there are...
